{{ _("Address") }}: {{ doc.address_display }}

 

 

Dear Sir/Madam,

 

We thank you very much for your enquiry and the discussions you had with the undersigned during my recent visit to your place regarding your requirement of best of breed crushing equipment for your project, we give below the details for your needful consideration.

 

We give below the Technical Specifications and our Offer for your needful consideration:

We trust that you will find our offer as per your requirement and look forward to hear from you at the earliest.

 

Thanking you and assuring you of our best services at all times,

 

Yours sincerely,

 

For PROMAN INFRASTRUCTURE SERVICES PVT. LTD.
